xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/157916-Blackadder Exclusive: The Whole Rotten Saga 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wOIITCueQHPNlpK9hGIKRumaF6K.jpg To mark the 25th anniversary since the first transmission of Blackadder in 1983, the iconic cast of the much-loved sitcom appear together in a documentary for the first time. The show includes an exclusive in-depth interview with Edmund Blackadder himself, Rowan Atkinson - the first time he has agreed to be interviewed about his experience making the show. Blackadder Exclusive: The Whole Rotten Saga
